title: Drawing, July 13, 1857
medium: Graphite, touched with brush and white gouache on greenish paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers throughout; again, at lower right:  2- Rich blue sky / 3- Clouds warm orange brownish / 4- Brown lights copper color very rich / snow very brilliant; and at bottom right:  Riobamba July 13th-/57
description: Horizontal view of high valleys leading toward snow covered ridges in the background below clouds at the right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, July 13, 1857.
July 13, 1857. Graphite, touched with brush and white gouache on greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-243.
